name: The Dream Machine
description:
The Dream Machine is an adventure game developed by Cockroach. It came out on 14-12-2010. It was published by Cockroach. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play The Dream Machine on PC and macOS. The game is sold via GOG.
It was directed by Anders Gustafsson. Ale Speranza, Douglas Holmquist, Jan Cardell and Jonathan Adamich scored the game.
